item.title: From Kubernetes to a Portable Secure and Compliant Platform: Databases, Message Queues and Caches
item.description: About this session Cloud technologies abstract away the messy and complex underlying platform, allowing you to focus on your magic sauce: pushing great features into your application. By outsourcing the platform to a trusted cloud provider, you accelerate innovation and stay ahead of the competition. Unfortunately, this comes at the expense of losing control.
